Comment: Abilities: A04H (Resurgent Flame Strike), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Conjures a pillar of flame that burns ground units for <A0F9,HeroDur1> seconds. The pillar of flame subsides after <A0F9,Dur1> seconds, during which units within continue to take a lesser amount of damage per second.
